New Records: Keider Montero threw his first career complete game shutout, allowing three hits and no walks over 96 pitches.
Key Match Events: Keider Montero pitched a complete game shutout, leading the Detroit Tigers to a win against the Colorado Rockies.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager A.J. Hinch highlighted Montero's performance as a significant achievement and praised his potential as a major league starter.
